  <h3>How Couples Meet and Stay Together</h3>
  <p>
<strong></strong>This data set contains information from a 2022 survey of people across the U.S. to understand how couples meet and stay together. It focuses on how relationships were influenced by the COVID-19 pandemic and offers insight at modern relationships, including changes in dating habits and how couples adapted during a challenging time.
